title: Overlay: clearer trust-first messaging when nothing is rendered
scope: Improve UX by emitting a clear note when tracks contain no renderable present ball records.
Keep success semantics unchanged (render still succeeds; overlay contains no markers).
acceptance: When there are no present ball records in image_px, CLI emits an informational note explaining that no markers will be drawn.
Unit tests cover trust-first null behavior; messaging remains concise.

deliverables.title: Messaging improvement
acceptance: Message is printed once and does not spam logs.
